mapper.select:
SELECT X.ID, X.TITLE, X.CONTENT, X.WRITER, X.WRITETIME, X.VIEWCOUNT, X.LIKECOUNT, NVL(COUNT(Y.BOARDID), 0) COMMENTCOUNT FROM (SELECT A.ID, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.WRITER, A.WRITETIME, A.VIEWCOUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN B.LIKEEXIST = 1 THEN 1 END) LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD A LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE B ON A.ID = B.BOARDID GROUP BY A.ID, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.WRITER, A.WRITETIME, A.VIEWCOUNT) X LEFT JOIN BOARD_COMMENT Y ON X.ID = Y.BOARDID
AND ${sort} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
GROUP BY X.ID, X.TITLE, X.CONTENT, X.WRITER, X.WRITETIME, X.VIEWCOUNT, X.LIKECOUNT, Y.BOARDID ORDER BY ID DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{numberOfPage} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, WRITETIME, VIEWCOUNT) VALUES(BOARD_AUTOINC.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{writeTime}, #{viewCount})
